sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This action retrieves configuration of a job from Jenkins Server.

Inputs:

  • Job Path - Name of the Job to retrieve configuration of a job. Provide full path if your job is under a folder. E.g. UAT-jobs/Jpetstore_v1.0.

Outputs:

  • Job Config - Will be set to the configuration of a job retrieved from the given job.
  • Job Type - Class of the job.
  • Status - Will be set to “Success" if the request succeeds or “Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

Error Messages:

  • The requested job doesn't exists or inaccessible.
  • Provided value for Job Path is incorrect.
  • The provided path is a Folder Path and not a Job Path.
  • You do not have enough permissions to perform this action in Jenkins server.
  • Invalid username or password/token.
  • The Jenkins server is being restarted.

To use this action, the corresponding Jenkins connection and credential must be created and associated with the Jenkins Connection & Credential alias.

Disclaimer:Jenkins and Jenkins logo are a registered trademark of Jenkins.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Get Job Configuration_Final

11:24:20</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
  
  try{
    inputs = new JenkinsUtils().trimStringInputs(inputs);
    inputs.job_path = inputs.job_path.replace(/^\/|\/$/g, '');
    var job_full_path = "";
    if(inputs.job_path.contains("/")){
        var parent_jobs =  inputs.job_path.split('/');
        for(var i=0; i<parent_jobs.length;i++ ){
            job_full_path += "/job/" + parent_jobs[i];
        }
        outputs.job_path = job_full_path.toString();
    }else{
        outputs.job_path = "/job/" + inputs.job_path.toString();
    }
  }
  catch(err){
  	throw new Error("Provided value for Job Path is incorrect.");
  }
})(inputs, outputs);

    if (inputs.status_code == '200') {
        if (JSON.parse(inputs.response)._class == "com.cloudbees.hudson.plugins.folder.Folder") {
            outputs.status = "Error";
            outputs.error_message = "The provided path is a Folder Path and not a Job Path.";

            outputs.status = "Success";
            outputs.job_type = JSON.parse(inputs.response)._class;
            outputs.job_config = JSON.parse(inputs.response);
        }
    } else {
        outputs = new JenkinsErrorHandler().jobErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
    }

11:24:20</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
  
  try{
    inputs = new JenkinsUtils().trimStringInputs(inputs);
    inputs.job_path = inputs.job_path.replace(/^\/|\/$/g, '');
    var job_full_path = "";
    if(inputs.job_path.contains("/")){
        var parent_jobs =  inputs.job_path.split('/');
        for(var i=0; i<parent_jobs.length;i++ ){
            job_full_path += "/job/" + parent_jobs[i];
        }
        outputs.job_path = job_full_path.toString();
    }else{
        outputs.job_path = "/job/" + inputs.job_path.toString();
    }
  }
  catch(err){
  	throw new Error("Provided value for Job Path is incorrect.");
  }
})(inputs, outputs);
</value><variable display_value="">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value 11:24:21</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
    if (inputs.status_code == '200') {
        if (JSON.parse(inputs.response)._class == "com.cloudbees.hudson.plugins.folder.Folder") {
            outputs.status = "Error";
            outputs.error_message = "The provided path is a Folder Path and not a Job Path.";
        } else {
            outputs.status = "Success";
            outputs.job_type = JSON.parse(inputs.response)._class;
            outputs.job_config = JSON.parse(inputs.response);
        }
    } else {
        outputs = new JenkinsErrorHandler().jobErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
    }
})(inputs, outputs);</value><variable display_value="">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value
